str2: Three. Or neuter tria a primary number; 'three'.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular

str2: Neither, nor, not even, and not. From ou and de; not however, i.e. Neither, nor, not even.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To drink, imbibe. A prolonged form of pio, which poo occurs only as an alternate in certain tenses; to imbibe.
